ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Gulshan Cultural Forum Kashmir (GCF Kashmir), a recognized and registered theatrical, Cultural/literary organization has been rendering its services to art literature music and Drama for the last two and a half decades. To impart Theatrical Education and encourage theatre as medium of conveying certain messages is one of the Basic areas of the organization. In this regard theatrical activities are conducted regularly by this House. To develop the Kashmiri Culture in general and bring back to rails the dying heritage of Kashmir, it organizes various competitions musical concerts, symposiums and theatrical events from time to time. The Organization is at work to explore the hidden talent to make good of it in order to transmit our cultural heritage to the new generation. As a means to meet this end we at times bring forth different publications with different subject matter. In addition to this it has its own Bi-monthly literary magazine Faryad in which contemporary and classical literature is published to encourage the literary trend. Art and literature of all kinds from Sufi shairy to creative writings from fine arts to stage Drama is all our concern. We are pride for not having a limited scope in this regard.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The-Sara is J&K based registered non-profit organization working towards society in which fewer individuals die by suicide. Mission: 1.Crisis Support - services that provide immediate support to individuals at times of difficulty in their lives, and support for communities in the recovery of major events. 2.Suicide Prevention - services that educate individuals and communities about suicide and offer appropriate support for those people who are at risk of suicide or bereaved by suicide. 3.Mental Health Support - services that provide support for people experiencing mental illness and which offer reliable information and self help resources to empower people to take steps towards maintaining health and emotional well being.

OFFICES OF THE Tribal Research and Cultural Foundation It is provided in the Constitution of the Tribal Research and Cultural Foundation that its headquarters shall be at Poonch but it may be partially work in tribal Belts of India. ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The aim of the society is to help and provide care to the underprivileged children at present there are more than 600 children who are getting education and day meal in center and associated schools Till date more than 13000 underprivileged children have been benefited under the purview of the society for the last two and half decades Our main aim is to give such children an opportunity for participation in the educational system of the country With out 27 years experience of work in the slums of Jammu city we will be able to divert children from begging and child labour to formal education through non formal educational bridge education We provide vocational trainings and counselling of the parents of the children Working without any assistance from any Government we are proud of some of the children who have been diverted from beggary child labour and balloon sellers to get formal education in the mainstream of education system of the country

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Our society VOICE is working for the upliftment of the weaker section of the society particulars for the youth , Women, Children by way of organizing awareness camps in the field of Education, Environment, Health, HIV-AIDS, Self Employment Generation, Formation of Self Help Groups , Legal Literacy & by organizing Skill Dev/ Vocational Trainings for them for their socio economics Upliftment. In this connection our society had organized the following programs Free Eye & Health Camps, 3 Day Multiactivities Awareness Camps , Youth Leadership Training camps , Formation of SHG Camps, Environment Awareness Camps , Camps/ Workshops on HIV/AIDS & Health Life Style Plantation, Cleanliness Drive , Blood Donation Camps, PIL & writ petition filed by our organization for seeking justice , Organised press conferences on the subject youth , women & children. This socio economic , educational, emotional & judicial empowerment., Distribution of cloths, Stationary & food among the orphans & militancy affected childrens / women of the Gool, Mahore, Doda etc. Our organized had also organized various health baby show programs, different competitions on the subject National Integration , Healthy Life Style, Environment , socio economic, educational , empowerment of the Urban Youth & children. Now our main focus is on formation of SHGs & to impart Vocational Trainings for the Rural & Poor womens for their socio economic development & to aware & educate the children / Youth about different social problems

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: 1. our organisation is affiliated to the worlds largest university i,e INDIRA GANDHI NATIONAL OPEN UNIVERSITY maiden new- Delhi and is running a special study centre vide their no SSC-1228-D Magam Budgam, by virtue of whcih our organisation is serving education to thousands of students in completing their degrees such as B.A , b.com , bca, ma , mcom , mttm , mpa, mah, meg, mps, mec, mard, mso etc. which we are running since 2000 till date. During the year 2015-16 about 800 students sought admission through our study centre which is being run by our organsation and 1250 studnts have sought admiussion in these courses run by our society. 2. our organisation is alos running one year Diploma in urdu Language (NCPUL) Ministry of Human Resources Development Govt. of India. and during the year 2015-16 and 95 students got themselvces admitted to achieve this One Year Diploma in Urdu language. 3.Our organisation is also certified by Khadi and Village industries commission Mumbai, Govt. of India (KVIV) to implement Khadi and Village Programmes to provide work and wages to hundreds of Khadi Artisans Khadi weavers and spinners under the fold of Gandhi-an khadi programmes. 4. Our organisation conduts several awareness camps of foeticide, female sec ratio diminishing, awareness on National interated, communal harmony, child - Labour,Dowery etc . in order to create awareness amongst the masses with special focus on women. 5.our organistaion has provided computer education to so many boys and girls on a nominal fee to facilitate them to get computer education easily. 6. our organisation has made a base-line survey on the gross route level in District Baramulla and identified 1000 artisans in different Arts & crafts in handicratfs sector, and formulated a big project under the AHVY- Baba Ambedkar Hastshilip yojna and was submitted to Development Commissioner (Handicrafts) Ministry of Texttiles, Govt of India, New Delhi, Which has been Sanctioned by DCH-New Delhi Vide Their letter no : C-12011/24/2013-14-CC(NR)-1/17531 Dated 24.06.2014. The project is for period of 05 yrs duration, which our organisation has started and shall complete in record time depending upon the avaiolability of funds to be relesed by the sponsoring deparments. 7. our organisation got registered itself with national institute of Electronics and information techonology, govt of India vide their reg. No 88001513/NIELIT dated 08.11.2013 as facilitaion Centre to Conducting traning and fielding candidates for CCC and BCC on self certification basis. Our organisation is a social Organisation and has a dream of serving people for which we have a mission and here are so many tasks before our oranisation which we want to fulfil for which our organisation sall approach to so many agencies, organisations, state and central govt. for financial assistance for implementaion of these programmes.
